com.phunware.engagement.location.internal

Class LocationBasedService

  • com.phunware.engagement.location.internal.LocationBasedService

  • public class LocationBasedService

    This class is responsible for handling all location related services.

    It provides the services as below:

    • Get the last location
    • Start significant location update service, and SignificantLocationUpdateReceiver is responsible for receiving the location update.
    • Start high accuracy location update, which only continues 10 seconds. - You can subscribe location update with multiple listeners. - Always only one location update service is running although you request multiple times.
    • Monitor geofence, and GeofenceTransitionsIntentService is responsible for receiving the geofence events.
    • Try to adjust monitored geofence whenever location updates
